title: Rust Free Download Direct Link (v2590 Multi-game)
description:
The only aim in Rust is to survive . To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players, and kill them for meat. Create alliances with other players and form a town. A huge world with different secrets, a complex system of survival, which requires the player to constantly search for resources, other players from whom you can expect anything, the ability to join groups, excellent physics and graphics , a good crafting system, the ability to create bases and much more.
Plunging into the world of “ Rust ” you will find many shocks, because your main enemy will be hunger and thirst, which push hundreds of players to violence, forcing others to unite and act as carefully as possible. Collect resources, hunt, build a base, and if you want to get everything quickly and immediately, you can take a chance and take it away from another player. Rust is a multiplayer survival in a huge open world. For the test, you can play on third-party servers and, if you like the game, then buy it.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better

game_info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG
